001package fr.aumgn.dac2.commands;
002
003import fr.aumgn.bukkitutils.command.Commands;
004import fr.aumgn.bukkitutils.command.arg.CommandArgFactory;
005import fr.aumgn.dac2.DAC;
006import fr.aumgn.dac2.commands.arg.ArenaArg;
007import fr.aumgn.dac2.commands.arg.StageArg;
008
009public abstract class DACCommands implements Commands {
010
011    protected final DAC dac;
012    protected final CommandArgFactory<ArenaArg> Arena;
013    protected final CommandArgFactory<StageArg> Stage;
014
015    public DACCommands(DAC dac) {
016        this.dac = dac;
017        this.Arena = new CommandArgFactory<ArenaArg>() {
018            @Override
019            public ArenaArg createCommandArg(String string) {
020                return new ArenaArg(DACCommands.this.dac, string);
021            }
022        };
023        this.Stage = new CommandArgFactory<StageArg>() {
024            @Override
025            public StageArg createCommandArg(String string) {
026                return new StageArg(DACCommands.this.dac, string);
027            }
028        };
029    }
030
031    protected String msg(String key) {
032        return dac.getCmdMessages().get(key);
033    }
034
035    protected String msg(String key, Object... arguments) {
036        return dac.getCmdMessages().get(key, arguments);
037    }
038}
